description: Cute NYC studio apt in the heart of the UES. Blocks away from Central Park and the Met. Comfortably houses 2 with full kitchen and queen size bed. Around the corner from amazing restaurants and easy access downtown on the 6 line.
name: Studio in ❤️ of Upper East Side
review: My friend and I had an amazing time in New York. It was my fourth time and her first adventure in the Big Apple. The apartment was lovely and comfortable for two people. The neighborhood was unique as well, just a few blocks from Central Park. Kathryn was very responsive from the moment we chatted about availability. I would highly recommend her place to anyone who wants a comfy, convenient spot away from the hustle and bustle of downtown, but close enough to the train so you can easily get anywhere in the city during your stay.
